channel.title: No one can connect
channel.description:
I know I have posted this but i could not bump it and the people who said they would help me have not been online unfortunately.
Now getting right on with it. My problem is that I change the no-ip from all the .java folders and still can't get anyone on my server. The main screen starts for them but it say error connecting to server.
This is a 317.
Source I have used : [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,344927.0.html]Homiescape[/url]
Things I have done:
[ol][li]Set up a no-ip account and have made a host.[/li] [li]Port forwarded.(I think ill give screenies)[/li] [li]Allowed it through my firewall.[/li] [li]Changed all of the no-ips in the client and in the source.[/li] [li]Downloaded no-ip.[/li] [li]Run the server.[/li] [li]Run no-ip[/li] [li]I can connect and none of my mates can.[/li][/ol]
Screenies of my port forwards:
[URL=http://img6.imageshack.us/i/port1v.jpg/][IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/3286/port1v.jpg[/img][/URL]
Do I need to do this? Have I done it wrong?
[URL=http://img541.imageshack.us/i/port2j.jpg/][IMG]http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/8010/port2j.jpg[/img][/URL]
Any help is appreciated and if you need any more info just ask for it. Thanks in advanced :).

item.title: No one can connect
item.dc:creator: @tbagu2 tbagu2
item.description:
@tbagu2 wrote:

Hey Junes yea I have tried this but it does not work ither.

Not sure what the problem is…

Read full topic

item.title: No one can connect
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

get teamviewer and ill help you or alternativly if you can follow simple instructions, forgot portforwarding an all that malarky get the torrent software : Uttorrent, when you have downloaded and installed that goto options>preferences and change what ever current port you have to 43594 (run your server first) this will open up your port acting as a portforward, hope i helped

Regards Junes

Read full topic

item.title: No one can connect
item.dc:creator: @tbagu2 tbagu2
item.description:
@tbagu2 wrote:

I know I have posted this but i could not bump it and the people who said they would help me have not been online unfortunately.

Now getting right on with it. My problem is that I change the no-ip from all the .java folders and still can’t get anyone on my server. The main screen starts for them but it say error connecting to server.

This is a 317.

Source I have used : Homiescape

Things I have done:

[ol][li]Set up a no-ip account and have made a host.[/li]
[li]Port forwarded.(I think ill give screenies)[/li]
[li]Allowed it through my firewall.[/li]
[li]Changed all of the no-ips in the client and in the source.[/li]
[li]Downloaded no-ip.[/li]
[li]Run the server.[/li]
[li]Run no-ip[/li]
[li]I can connect and none of my mates can.[/li][/ol]

Screenies of my port forwards:

Do I need to do this? Have I done it wrong?

Any help is appreciated and if you need any more info just ask for it.
Thanks in advanced :).

Read full topic
